welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sagamihara, a city known for its beautiful natural scenery, vibrant cultural scene, and rich history. We invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: カレーの店 マボロシ
restaurants.description: カレーの店 マボロシ is a japanese curry restaurant located in 相模原市.
restaurants.address: 中央区中央3-7-1, 相模原市, 神奈川県, 252-0239

restaurants.address: 中央区横山4-25-5, 相模原市, 神奈川県, 252-0242

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for official military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Haneda Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Haneda Airport, serving mostly domestic flights within Japan.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
